entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Always provide existing version information in `dotnet workload list --machine-readable`, even if no update is available #22882
    6.0.2xx
  • Locking issues with multiple dotnet watch processes with shared dependencies #22877
  • error NU1604: Project dependency Microsoft.Azure.Kus to.Cloud.Platform does not contain an inclusive lower bound. Include a lower bound in the dependency version to ensure consistent restore results. #22867
  • Re-enable test ItShouldShowWarningMessageOnCollectCodeCoverageThatProfilerWasNotInitialized if appropriate #22865

Closed

  • Register subcommand for dotnet nuget trust command #20249

PullRequests

Created

  • upgrade ubuntu version #22879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 #22875
  • Fix typo in Strings.zh-Hans.xlf #22866
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Blazor AoT Publish Integration Tests #22682
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 as 1604 goes out of support soon #17260

Updated

  • Exclude runtimeidentifiers for runtimepack #22658
    Area-Workloads
